summary: January 14 is the 14th day of the year in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
January 14 is the 14th day of the year in the Gregorian calendar. There are 351 days remaining until the end of the year .
In the 20th and 21st centuries the Julian calendar is 13 days behind the Gregorian calendar, thus January 14 is sometimes celebrated as New Year's Day  by religious groups who use the Julian calendar.
title: January 14
